pages.title: Welling Up
pages.text: Though the connection between $(thing)Mana$() and $(thing)Starlight$() is weak, insetting a $(item)Rune of Air$() into a basin of $(item)Marble$() with some $(item)Aquamarine$() and a $(item)Rock Crystal$() is enough to cause it to actively focus $(thing)Starlight$() through what is placed in it, transforming the essence of that item into a liquid.

This serves two valuable purposes. Firstly, $(item)Aquamarine$() and $(item)Rock Crystals$() can melt into $(item)Liquid Starlight$() which will be needed going forward. Furthermore, many of the liquid production processes you've done up to now can be performed more effectively with a $(item)Lightwell$().
